name: 2048 Match Shooter Web Version
description:
How to play? 

Tap the screen within the border area to trigger the number block forward and match two of the same block together. Add as many numbers together and try not to have the blocks touch the ground or it will be game over. 

You can only use your mouse to click onto the board and not with your keyboard.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Test your Skillz and see if you can beat your own score and challenge others. Download the app for iOS or Android and see if you can score big. Also, collect tickets and win real cash prizes. 

We also will love to get your feedback and to hear some suggestions. Also, you can donate to uses to help us to spread the word and we also have our own merch store, you can check it out.  Get Here: https://rubixcubestudios.com/shop/

You can download the android version from the Skillz page.  Download here: https://games.skillz.com/game/17106
